content:
I have a question. Can I make the payment in cash?

I'm not very familiar with the payment process in your country.

I want to make sure I pay the rent on time every month.

What kind of payment method do you accept?

Thank you for your help.

Sincerely, Hassan Rahman.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Of course, Hassan. I understand that you may be unfamiliar with the payment process in my country. I accept both cash and bank transfers as payment methods for the rental price. If you prefer to pay in cash, you can do so by delivering the payment to me in person at my property office during business hours. Alternatively, you can pay the rental price through bank transfer to my specified account. I recommend using bank transfer as it is a more secure and convenient method of payment. Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
